turns.message: (Quietly) That discomfort means you're growing—it's proof you're pushing past your comfort zone. Awkward emails are how most meaningful connections start. You're doing exactly what brave students do.

turns.speaker: dummy
turns.message: (Keeps typing aggressively) "Can we maybe not meet in person? Like ever?" Ugh, I sound like such a coward. This is why I'll never get that research position I want.
